name: Red Riding Hood (itch) (warshiah)
description: The story is a fairytale story named little red riding hood. The most interesting thing about this story is that it gives the user an opportunity to choose what to do next. I feel that the pictures are matching with the passages and the audio and background music. And most of all I’m happy that I was able to add a GIF since I’m a beginner so it was a bit hard for me to add it to my story. After numerous struggles, I was able to move the pictures, the text in the center, and I’m happy that it looks good enough to be presented. There are many other things that I wanted to do to make my story more interesting. The background music is good but I think it could’ve been better because it is essential to a story and gives life to the story. I changed my story, the options many times and even replaced a few pictures. I feel that the story could become better if I could add transparent background images so that they would blend in with the background of that passage. I struggled with the background music because I was not able to play it
